description: Descriptions:This Wireless Mouse is a good choice for you: 10m Wireless Operation Distance, Ergonomic Design, High Accuracy, High Quality, Modern Design....Features:Slim Mini 2.4GHz Optical USB Wireless Mouse Mice2.4GHz wireless transmission up to 10 meters operating distance.Intelligent connectivity, no need to code, plug-and play.Ergonomically designed, comfortable to use.New non-delay technology.DPI (3 modes) adjustable.Powered by 2 x AAA  battery. (battery NOT included)With an ON/OFF switch.Intelligent power saving management. Low power consumption.Nano USB Dongle.Ultra slim, compact and lightweight, easy to carry.Decent and modern design.Ideal laptop and desktop companion for home and office use.package contents:1x 2.4G Wireless USB Optical Mouse with Mini Receiver
title: Neewer 2.4G DPI Wireless USB Optical Mouse with Mini Receiver for Laptop Notebook, Gray
